    • updateTurn

      public void updateTurn(String username, Coordinate coordinate, Card cardPlaced, Player currentPlayer, Card cardPicked, Card newGroundCard)
      Update the turn
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the last current Player
      coordinate - the Coordinate of the new Card placed
      cardPlaced - the new Card placed
      currentPlayer - the new current Player
      cardPicked - the Card picked from the last current Player
      newGroundCard - the new ground Card(If the last current Player picked from ground)
